h3501.definition: by variation for {{h3502}}; Jithra, an Israelite (or Ishmaelite); Ithra.

h3502.definition: feminine of {{h3499}}; properly, excellence, i.e. (by implication) wealth; abundance, riches.

h3503.definition: from {{h3499}} with pron. suffix; his excellence; Jethro, Moses' father-in-law; Jethro. Compare {{h3500}}.

h3504.definition: from {{h3498}}; preeminence, gain; better, excellency(-leth), profit(-able).

h3505.definition: patronymically from {{h3500}}; a Jithrite or descendant of Jether; Ithrite.

h3506.definition: from {{h3498}}; excellent; Jithran, the name of an Edomite and of an Israelite; Ithran.

h3507.definition: from {{h3499}} and {{h5971}}; excellence of people; Jithream, a son of David; Ithream.

h3508.definition: feminine active participle of {{h3498}}; the lobe or flap of the liver (as if redundant or outhanging); caul.

h3509.definition: of uncertain derivation; Jetheth, an Edomite; Jetheth.

h3510.definition: a primitive root; properly, to feel pain; by implication, to grieve; figuratively, to spoil; grieving, mar, have pain, make sad (sore), (be) sorrowful.

h3511.definition: from {{h3510}}; suffering (physical or mental), adversity; grief, pain, sorrow.

h3512.definition: a primitive root; to despond; causatively, to deject; broken, be grieved, make sad.

h3513.definition: or כָּבֵד; a primitive root; to be heavy, i.e. in a bad sense (burdensome, severe, dull) or in a good sense (numerous, rich, honorable); causatively, to make weighty (in the same two senses); abounding with, more grievously afflict, boast, be chargeable, × be dim, glorify, be (make) glorious (things), glory, (very) great, be grievous, harden, be (make) heavy, be heavier, lay heavily, (bring to, come to, do, get, be had in) honour (self), (be) honourable (man), lade, × more be laid, make self many, nobles, prevail, promote (to honour), be rich, be (go) sore, stop.

h3514.definition: from {{h3513}}; weight, multitude, vehemence; grievousness, heavy, great number.

h3515.definition: from {{h3513}}; heavy; figuratively in a good sense (numerous) or in a bad sense (severe, difficult, stupid); (so) great, grievous, hard(-ened), (too) heavy(-ier), laden, much, slow, sore, thick.

h3516.definition: the same as {{h3515}}; the liver (as the heaviest of the viscera); liver.

h3518.definition: a primitive root; to expire or (causatively) to extinguish (fire, light, anger); go (put) out, quench.

h3519.definition: rarely כָּבֹד; from {{h3513}}; properly, weight, but only figuratively in a good sense, splendor or copiousness; glorious(-ly), glory, honour(-able).

h3520.definition: irregular feminine passive participle of {{h3513}}; weightiness, i.e. magnificence, wealth; carriage, all glorious, stately.

h3521.definition: from the same as {{h3525}} in the sense of limitation; sterile; Cabul, the name of two places in Palestine; Cabul.

h3522.definition: from an unused root meaning to heap up; hilly; Cabon, a place in Palestine; Cabbon.

h3523.definition: from {{h3527}} in the original sense of plaiting; a matrass (of intertwined materials); pillow.

h3524.definition: from {{h3527}}; vast, whether in extent (figuratively, of power, mighty; of time, aged), or in number, many; feeble, mighty, most, much, strong, valiant.

h3525.definition: from an unused root meaning to twine or braid together; a fetter; fetter.

h3526.definition: a primitive root; to trample; hence, to wash (properly, by stamping with the feet), whether literal (including the fulling process) or figurative; fuller, wash(-ing).

h3527.definition: a primitive root; properly, to plait together, i.e. (figuratively) to augment (especially in number or quantity, to accumulate); in abundance, multiply.

h3528.definition: from {{h3527}}; properly, extent of time, i.e. a great while; hence, long ago, formerly, hitherto; already, (seeing that which), now.

h3529.definition: the same as {{h3528}}; length; Kebar, a river of Mesopotamia; Chebar. Compare {{h2249}}.

h3530.definition: feminine of {{h3528}}; properly, length, i.e. a measure (of uncertain dimension); × little.

h3531.definition: from {{h3527}} in its original sense; a sieve (as netted); sieve.

h3532.definition: from an unused root meaning to dominate; a ram (just old enough to butt); lamb, sheep.

h3533.definition: a primitive root; to tread down; hence, negatively, to disregard; positively, to conquer, subjugate, violate; bring into bondage, force, keep under, subdue, bring into subjection.

h3534.definition: from {{h3533}}; a footstool (as trodden upon); footstool.

h3535.definition: or כַּבְשָׂה; feminine of {{h3532}}; a ewe; (ewe) lamb.

h3536.definition: from {{h3533}}; a smelting furnace (as reducing metals); furnace.

h3537.definition: from an unused root meaning to deepen; properly, a pail; but generally of earthenware; a jar for domestic purposes; barrel, pitcher.

h3538.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h3576}}; false; lying.

h3539.definition: from the same as {{h3537}} in the sense of striking fire from a metal forged; a sparkling gem, probably the ruby; agate.

h3540.definition: of foreign origin; Kedorlaomer, an early Persian king; Chedorlaomer.

h3541.definition: from the prefix k and {{h1931}}; properly, like this, i.e. by implication, (of manner) thus (or so); also (of place) here (or hither); or (of time) now; also, here,   hitherto, like, on the other side, so (and much), such, on that manner, (on) this (manner, side, way, way and that way),   mean while, yonder.

h3543.definition: a primitive root; to be weak, i.e. (figuratively) to despond (causatively, rebuke), or (of light, the eye) to grow dull; darken, be dim, fail, faint, restrain, × utterly.

h3544.definition: from {{h3543}}; feeble, obscure; somewhat dark, darkish, wax dim, heaviness, smoking.

h3545.definition: feminine of {{h3544}}; properly, a weakening; figuratively, alleviation, i.e. cure; healing.

h3546.definition: (Aramaic) a root corresponding to and {{h3557}}; to be able; be able, could.

h3547.definition: a primitive root, apparently meaning to mediate in religious services; but used only as denominative from {{h3548}}; to officiate as a priest; figuratively, to put on regalia; deck, be (do the office of a, execute the, minister in the) priest('s office).

h3548.definition: active participle of {{h3547}}; literally one officiating, a priest; also (by courtesy) an acting priest (although a layman); chief ruler, × own, priest, prince, principal officer.

h3551.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h3854}} in the sense of piercing; a window (as a perforation); window.

h3552.definition: of foreign derivation; Kub, a country near Egypt; Chub.

h3553.definition: from an unused root meaning to be high or rounded; a helmet (as arched); helmet. Compare {{h6959}}.

h3554.definition: a primitive root; properly, to prick or penetrate; hence, to blister (as smarting or eating into); burn.

h3556.definition: probably from the same as {{h3522}} (in the sense of rolling) or {{h3554}} (in the sense of blazing); a star (as round or as shining); figuratively, a prince; star(-gazer).

h3557.definition: a primitive root; properly, to keep in; hence, to measure; figuratively, to maintain (in various senses); (be able to, can) abide, bear, comprehend, contain, feed, forbearing, guide, hold(-ing in), nourish(-er), be present, make provision, receive, sustain, provide sustenance (victuals).

h3558.definition: from an unused root meaning to store away; a jewel (probably gold beads); tablet.

h3559.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be erect (i.e. stand perpendicular); hence (causatively) to set up, in a great variety of applications, whether literal (establish, fix, prepare, apply), or figurative (appoint, render sure, proper or prosperous); certain(-ty), confirm, direct, faithfulness, fashion, fasten, firm, be fitted, be fixed, frame, be meet, ordain, order, perfect, (make) preparation, prepare (self), provide, make provision, (be, make) ready, right, set (aright, fast, forth), be stable, (e-) stablish, stand, tarry, × very deed.

h3560.definition: probably from {{h3559}}; established; Kun, a place in Syria; Chun.

h3561.definition: from {{h3559}}; something prepared, i.e. a sacrificial wafer; cake.

h3562.definition: from {{h3559}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has sustained; Conanjah, the name of two Israelites; Conaniah, Cononiah. Compare {{h3663}}.

h3563.definition: from an unused root meaning to hold together; a cup (as a container), often figuratively, a lot (as if a potion); also some unclean bird, probably an owl (perhaps from the cup-like cavity of its eye); cup, (small) owl. Compare {{h3599}}.

h3564.definition: from an unused root meaning properly, to dig through; a pot or furnace (as if excavated); furnace. Compare {{h3600}}.

h3565.definition: from {{h3564}} and {{h6227}}; furnace of smoke; Cor-Ashan, a place in Palestine; Chorashan.

h3566.definition: or (Ezra 1:1 (last time),2) כֹּרֶשׁ; from the Persian; Koresh (or Cyrus), the Persian king; Cyrus.

h3568.definition: probably of foreign origin; Cush (or Ethiopia), the name of a son of Ham, and of his territory; also of an Israelite; Chush, Cush, Ethiopia.

h3569.definition: patronymically from {{h3568}}; a Cushite, or descendant of Cush; Cushi, Cushite, Ethiopian(-s).

h3570.definition: the same as {{h3569}}; Cushi, the name of two Israelites; Cushi.

h3571.definition: feminine of {{h3569}}; a Cushite woman; Ethiopian.

h3572.definition: perhaps from {{h3568}}; Cushan, a region of Arabia; Cushan.

h3573.definition: apparently from {{h3572}} and the dual of {{h7564}}; Cushan of double wickedness; Cushan-Rishathajim, a Mesopotamian king; Chushan-rishathayim.

h3574.definition: from {{h3787}}; prosperity; in plural freedom; × chain.

h3575.definition: or (feminine) כּוּתָה; of foreign origin; Cuth or Cuthah, a province of Assyria; Cuth.

h3576.definition: a primitive root; to lie (i.e. deceive), literally or figuratively; fail, (be found a, make a) liar, lie, lying, be in vain.

h3577.definition: from {{h3576}}; falsehood; literally (untruth) or figuratively (idol); deceitful, false, leasing,   liar, lie, lying.

h3578.definition: from {{h3576}}; fallacious; Cozeba, a place in Palestine; Choseba.

h3579.definition: from {{h3576}}; false; Cozbi, a Midianitess; Cozbi.

h3580.definition: from {{h3576}}; falsified; Kezib, a place in Palestine; Chezib.

h3581.definition: or (Daniel 11:6) כּוֹחַ; from an unused root meaning to be firm; vigor, literally (force, in a good or a bad sense) or figuratively (capacity, means, produce); also (from its hardiness) a large lizard; ability, able, chameleon, force, fruits, might, power(-ful), strength, substance, wealth.

h3582.definition: a primitive root; to secrete, by act or word; hence (intensively) to destroy; conceal, cut down (off), desolate, hide.

h3583.definition: a primitive root; to paint (with stibium); paint.

h3584.definition: a primitive root; to be untrue, in word (to lie, feign, disown) or deed (to disappoint, fail, cringe); deceive, deny, dissemble, fail, deal falsely, be found liars, (be-) lie, lying, submit selves.

h3585.definition: from {{h3584}}; literally a failure of flesh, i.e. emaciation; figuratively, hypocrisy; leanness, lies, lying.

h3587.definition: from {{h3554}}; a brand or scar; burning.

h3588.definition: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent; (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed; and,   (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly),   but, certainly, doubtless,   else, even,   except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that,   nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore,   (al-) though,   till, truly,   until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

h3589.definition: from a primitive root meaning to strike; a crushing; figuratively, calamity; destruction.

h3590.definition: from the same as {{h3589}} (compare {{h3539}}); properly, something struck off, i.e. a spark (as struck); spark.

h3591.definition: from the same as {{h3589}}; (perhaps smaller than {{h2595}}); properly, something to strike with, i.e. a dart; lance, shield, spear, target.

h3592.definition: the same as {{h3591}}; Kidon, a place in Palestine; Chidon.

h3593.definition: of uncertain derivation; perhaps tumult; battle.

h3594.definition: from {{h3559}}; properly, a statue, i.e. idol; but used (by euphemism) for some heathen deity (perhaps corresponding to Priapus or Baal-peor); Chiun.

h3595.definition: or כִּיֹּר; from the same as {{h3564}}; properly, something round (as excavated or bored), i.e. a chafing-dish for coals or a caldron for cooking; hence (from similarity of form) a washbowl; also (for the same reason) a pulpit or platform; hearth, laver, pan, scaffold.

h3596.definition: or כֵּלַי; from {{h3557}} in the sense of withholding; niggardly; churl.

h3597.definition: from an unused root meaning to clap or strike with noise; a club or sledge-hammer; hammer.

h3598.definition: from the same as {{h3558}}; a cluster of stars, i.e. the Pleiades; Pleiades, seven stars.

h3599.definition: a form for {{h3563}}; a cup; also a bag for money or weights; bag, cup, purse.

h3600.definition: a form for {{h3564}} (only in the dual); a cooking range (consisting of two parallel stones, across which the boiler is set); ranges for pots.
